column3: place the now dirty dishes in the sink .
pick a dish up and place it on another dish .
continue until all dishes are in one stack .
carry the stack to the kitchen sink .
place the stack in the sink .

if all dishes have been picked up continue to kitchen .

hold the dishes in your hand .

repeat steps 1-3 until all dishes are picked up .
